episode_event_trainersfile_kaki_mao/4001: What do you think of our specialty tea?
It was very tasty!

Yeah, I could feel it flow through my body. On top
of that, the temperature was just right.

I’m not surprised, considering I poured the hot
water at the perfect temperature!
And I, Cress, prepared the purest water...

And I chose the tea leaves—which are
vital—with confidence.

Our teamwork—using Grass, Fire, and Water—
creates the best tea!
Hmm...

What’s wrong, Mallow? There’s no way you didn’t
like the tea, right?
The tea was really tasty. That’s why...

we should try it too! The three of us teaming up
and cooking!

I see. We are Captains of Grass, Fire, and Water,
just like them.
Wait. Have you forgotten, Mallow?
We have our own teamwork too!
Huh?
I bring the Thick Club and Rare Bone...

And I, Lana, bring the Fresh Water and Rocky
Helmet as usual...

and you take the collected ingredients and smack
'em and crush 'em, grind 'em, and turn 'em into
goo for—

The Mallow Special is for the trials! I want to
make something else!

I see... Then we’ll have to come up with
another recipe.
This sounds interesting.
When your dish is done, please let us have a try.
Of course!

We’ll make a dish just as good as your
perfect tea!
episode_event_trainersfile_kaki_mao/4002: You three perfected your team-up cooking, right?

It seems the dish is already made, but can we not
eat it yet?

Arcanine will make sure the dish doesn’t get cold.
Please wait.
episode_event_trainersfile_kaki_mao/4003: Whoa!
The dish is glowing!
This is beautiful... How did you do it?
The secret is Shiinotic’s spores!
Wh-whaaat?!
I did hear that Shiinotic’s spores glow in the dark.
But they’re meant to send its prey to sleep...
Is...is it safe for people to eat?
Yep! Don’t worry about that!
Please eat up!
W-well then...

Hmm...very peculiar, but...there’s something
about it...

Uh… I think I am starting to get a bit sleepy
after all...
It-it’s spicy all of a sudden?!
S-SPICY!!!
Now, come over here.
Phew...
So, what do you think of the “Akala Trio Special”?

We arranged it so when you start feeling sleepy
from the spores, the spice from the Tamato Berry
wakes you up!
It...it was quite a thrilling dining experience...

I don’t think anyone can copy this
unconventional idea.

I think that comes from the quality of the
ingredients—and by that, I mean you three!
